column3: str
What would you like to do?
Learn about the Binding Coil of Bahamut.
Enter <hex:022815FF10>InstanceContent<hex:E8020403>.
Nothing.

The Binding Coil of Bahamut is comprised of multiple dungeons, or <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>turns<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain turns.
Progress within the Binding Coil of Bahamut is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.

Progress is reset every <hex:020603120303><hex:020942DDFF07>Sunday<hex:FF07>Monday<hex:FF08>Tuesday<hex:FF0A>Wednesday<hex:FF09>Thursday<hex:FF07>Friday<hex:FF09>Saturday<hex:03> at <hex:020821DBFF1D><hex:020919DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C03><hex:0D03> <hex:020810E0DB0DFF05>p.m.<hex:FF05>a.m.<hex:03> (Earth time).
To enter the Binding Coil of Bahamut, you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 50 or higher.
All members must also have completed the quest “Primal Awakening.”
The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.
Even party members who have not progressed as far as the party leader may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.
In this case, their progress will be updated to be the same as that of the leader.
Please note, however, that parties whose members have progressed further than the party leader cannot resume a foray.
All forays into the Binding Coil of Bahamut are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
Enter <hex:022815FF10>InstanceContent<hex:E8020403>?
Yes
No
You were unable to enter <hex:022815FF10>InstanceContent<hex:E8030403>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.
「大迷宮バハムート：邂逅編」をクリア<hex:02100103>（攻略進行度が最大に到達）しているため、<hex:02100103>次回は、リセット日後に再開することができます。

攻略進行度の記録は、<hex:02100103>（地球時間）毎週<hex:020603120303><hex:020942DDFF07>Sunday<hex:FF07>Monday<hex:FF08>Tuesday<hex:FF0A>Wednesday<hex:FF09>Thursday<hex:FF07>Friday<hex:FF09>Saturday<hex:03> at <hex:020821DBFF1D><hex:020919DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C03><hex:0D03> <hex:020810E0DB0DFF05>p.m.<hex:FF05>a.m.<hex:03>にリセットされます。<hex:02100103>次回の攻略は、リセット日までお待ちください。
